attributes.action: Stop making it so easy to live a good life on benefits.
attributes.additional_details:
Whilst it is necessary to make cuts it does feel that a protective bubble is placed around people living a very nice life purely off benefits who shouldn't be.

There are people who need help but there are too many living better lives off constant help and handouts for everything and now expect it as a way of life.

How about little cuts that would go a long way?
Stop free school lunches for a start. My child cannot have school dinners every day so why should someone on benefits? Do these children go without lunch at home on the weekend and holidays?

Stop free breakfast being delivered to homes because a couple decided to have so many kids and are now struggling.

Stop making it so easy for these people to have help and children, make these people realise that having children is their responsibility and not everyone elses. They chose to bring them into the world same as any other parent, we have to deal with cuts and cost of living when will they?
